trans-unit.source:
It seems that AutoFill did not close correctly the last time.
This can happen with large databases or memory-demanding database settings (Argon2).
Please contact us if you need help with this.
trans-unit.target:
La última vez «Autorrelleno» (AutoFill) no se cerró correctamente.
Esto puede ocurrir con grandes bases de datos o bases de datos que consumen mucha memoria (Argon2).
Póngase en contacto con nosotros si necesita ayuda al respecto.
No se ha encontrado nada adecuado.

trans-unit.target: Utilizar reconocimiento facial para desbloquear KeePassium

trans-unit.source: This passcode is easy to guess. Try entering a stronger one.
trans-unit.target: Este código de acceso es fácil de adivinar. Intenta introducir uno más seguro.
trans-unit.note: Notification when user tries to set up too weak an app protection passcode.
Call for action to select an entry field for filling out.

trans-unit.target: Identificación de la persona que llama: %@
trans-unit.note: An identifier of the app that called AutoFill. The term is intentionally similar to https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Caller_ID. [callerID: String]
Must match Apple's translation, as found in iOS 15 Settings → Passwords → AutoFill Passwords. If unsure, leave untranslated.
Call to action: deselect the `Keychain` option. Keychain is a glossary term.

trans-unit.source: To make KeePassium your default password manager, uncheck Keychain.
trans-unit.target: Para que KeePassium sea tu gestor de contraseñas por defecto, desmarca Cadena de claves.
trans-unit.note: Instruction to deselect the `Keychain` option. Keychain is a glossary term.

trans-unit.target: Usar contraseñas y llaves de acceso de:
trans-unit.note: Must match Apple's translation, as found in iOS 17 Settings → Passwords → Password Options. If unsure, leave untranslated.

trans-unit.source:
The AutoFill cannot automatically access the files you already have in the main KeePassium app.
Why? Behind the scenes, the system treats AutoFill as a separate app, independent from the main KeePassium process. For security reasons, an app cannot simply access any external files – unless you explicitly link these files to that app. Thus the system guarantees that the app can only access the few files you allowed it to.
As a result, both AutoFill and the main KeePassium app need to be given their own permissions for each external file. Luckily, this is a one-time procedure.
trans-unit.target:
«Autorrelleno» (AutoFill) no puede acceder automáticamente a los archivos de la aplicación principal de KeePassium.
¿Por qué? Internamente, el sistema trata «Autorrelleno» como una aplicación separada, independiente del proceso principal de KeePassium. Por razones de seguridad, una aplicación no puede simplemente acceder a ningún archivo externo, a menos que se vinculen explícitamente estos archivos con esa aplicación. Así, el sistema garantiza que la aplicación solo puede acceder a los archivos permitidos.
Como resultado, tanto la aplicación «Autorrelleno», como la aplicación principal de KeePassium deben recibir sus propios permisos para cada archivo externo. Afortunadamente, solo se necesita hacerlo una vez por cada nueva base de datos.

trans-unit.note: Apple Keychain software; is a glossary term.
Menu action to add a user-provided word list file to the app.
Password quality description. Note the tilda that refers to an estimated/approximate value. For example: `Very good (~123 bits of entropy)`. [level: String, formattedBitCount: String]
Password quality description. For example: `Very good (234 bits of entropy)`. [level: String, formattedBitCount: String]
Password quality description. For example: `Password quality: Weak`. [level: String]
Action/button to make password visible as plain-text
Call to action, invites the user to enable the Quick AutoFill feature

trans-unit.target: KeePassium se pondrá en contacto con todos los sitios web de su base de datos.

trans-unit.target: %1$@ se considera débil. Usa %2$@ en su lugar.

trans-unit.source: Increase the settings for optimal data protection.
trans-unit.target: Aumente los ajustes para una protección de datos óptima.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium is your vault. App protection ensures that only you can open it.

trans-unit.source: Your safe box is an encrypted database.

trans-unit.note: Text in the Data Encryption intro screen

trans-unit.source: You can keep databases in your favorite cloud or locally on device.

trans-unit.source: KeePassium keeps your passwords and other sensitive info securely encrypted.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium mantiene sus contraseñas y otra información sensible cifrada de forma segura.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: There are no ads and no tracking.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: We don't know anything about you.
trans-unit.note: Text in the introductory onboarding screen.
Text in the introductory onboarding screen.
Title of the introductory onboarding screen.

trans-unit.source: Your info is encrypted in a safe box (database). Safe boxes are stored in a vault (KeePassium).
trans-unit.target: Su información se cifra en una caja fuerte (base de datos). Las cajas fuertes se almacenan en una cámara acorazada (KeePassium).
trans-unit.note: Text in the Security intro screen

trans-unit.source: The vault and safe boxes have different keys and only you will know them.
trans-unit.target: La cámara acorazada y las cajas fuertes tienen claves diferentes y solo usted las conocerá.
trans-unit.note: Text in the Security intro screen
Title of the Security intro screen
Action to skip selected item/items in future password audits.
Status message: password audit in progress

trans-unit.source: An error occured while communicating with the HIBP service. %@
trans-unit.target: Se ha producido un error al comunicarse con el servicio HIBP. %@
trans-unit.note: Error message after a failed password audit request [message: String].

trans-unit.source: The number shows how many times the password has been found in known data leaks.
trans-unit.target: El número muestra cuántas veces se ha encontrado la contraseña en filtraciones de datos conocidas.
trans-unit.note: Description of the password audit results, where a number appears next to each password.

trans-unit.source:
Password audit checks your passwords against an online database of leaked passwords in a secure and private way.
KeePassium will send information calculated from your passwords — a kind of a partial checksum — to the [Have I Been Pwned](https://haveibeenpwned.com) service. The service will return detailed information about compromised passwords with similar checksums. The app will then compare the detailed checksums locally on the device and detect which of your passwords are at risk.
Your actual passwords are never shared with the online service. [Learn more…](%@)
trans-unit.target:
La auditoría de contraseñas coteja sus contraseñas con una base de datos online de contraseñas filtradas de forma segura y privada.
KeePassium enviará la información calculada a partir de sus contraseñas —una especie de suma de comprobación parcial— al servicio [Have I Been Pwned](https://haveibeenpwned.com). El servicio devolverá información detallada sobre contraseñas comprometidas con sumas de comprobación similares. La aplicación comparará entonces las sumas de comprobación detalladas localmente en el dispositivo y detectará cuáles de sus contraseñas están en peligro.
Sus contraseñas reales nunca se comparten con el servicio online. [Más información…](%@)
trans-unit.note: Description of the Password Audit function.

trans-unit.source: Good news! None of your passwords have appeared in known data leaks.
trans-unit.target: Buenas noticias. Ninguna de sus contraseñas ha aparecido en filtraciones de datos conocidas.

trans-unit.note: Title of a list with passwords that are known to have been exposed in online breaches.
Title of a screen to check which passwords are known to be compromised.

trans-unit.source: If you enter a wrong AppLock passcode, KeePassium will close all databases and clear all master keys from the keychain.
trans-unit.target: Si introduce un código de acceso AppLock incorrecto, KeePassium cerrará todas las bases de datos y borrará todas las claves maestras de la cadena de claves.

Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Wrong Passcode"; ObjectID = "5Dg-KX-m7a"; Note = "AppLock settings section: what to do when the user enters a wrong AppLock passcode.";

trans-unit.source: Allows biometric authentication as a quick (but less secure) alternative to AppLock passcode.
trans-unit.target: Permitir la autenticación biométrica como una alternativa más rápida (pero menos segura) al código de acceso AppLock.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Allows biometric authentication as a quick (but less secure) alternative to AppLock passcode."; ObjectID = "7ae-8I-LiQ"; Note = "AppLock settings section: biometric auth (Touch ID/Face ID)";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Biometrics"; ObjectID = "7ae-8I-LiQ"; Note = "AppLock settings section: biometric auth (Touch ID/Face ID)";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Timeout"; ObjectID = "Ef4-Jw-xeO"; Note = "Title for App Lock Timeout setting";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "{Use Touch ID / Face ID}"; ObjectID = "Fez-6g-oyk"; Note = "#bc-ignore!";

trans-unit.target: Proteja KeePassium de accesos no autorizados.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Protect KeePassium from unauthorized access."; ObjectID = "aBx-Ee-bMk"; Note = "Explanation for the `Enable AppLock` option.";

trans-unit.source: The app will automatically lock up after this time.
trans-unit.target: La aplicación se bloqueará automáticamente después de este tiempo.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "The app will automatically lock up after this time."; ObjectID = "m50-fl-4tu";

trans-unit.target: Tiempo de bloqueo de la aplicación

trans-unit.target: Restablecer tamaño de texto a predeterminado
trans-unit.note: Class = "UIButton"; accessibilityLabel = "Reset text size to default"; ObjectID = "5U9-NZ-sJe"; Note = "Action: set text size to standard size";

trans-unit.source: Hide passwords and other protected fields behind asterisks (recommended).
trans-unit.target: Ocultar contraseñas y otros campos protegidos detrás de asteriscos (recomendado).

Class = "UILabel"; text = "{Fill-in the perfect result automatically}"; ObjectID = "WDb-aU-Mmf";

trans-unit.source: When AutoFill inserts the username and password, it can also copy the one-time password (OTP) for you.
trans-unit.target: Cuando «Autorrelleno» inserta el nombre de usuario y la contraseña, también puede copiar contraseñas de un solo uso (OTP).
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "When AutoFill inserts the username and password, it can also copy the one-time password (OTP) for you."; ObjectID = "XYL-1l-Jx6";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "{Copy OTP to clipboard}"; ObjectID = "go1-Nt-isQ";

trans-unit.source: When AutoFill finds only one, perfectly matching, entry – this entry will be pasted automatically.
trans-unit.target: Si «Autorrelleno» encuentra solo una entrada que coincida, rellenará automáticamente el usuario y la contraseña.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "When AutoFill finds only one, perfectly matching, entry – this entry will be pasted automatically."; ObjectID = "jYl-ks-dFG";
Class = "UITableViewController"; title = "Keep Backup Files"; ObjectID = "atf-ra-KMC"; Note = "Dialog for selecting the duration of keeping the backup copies.";

trans-unit.source: KeePassium can automatically delete old backup files to free up some storage space.
trans-unit.target: KeePassium puede eliminar automáticamente copias de seguridad antiguas para liberar espacio de almacenamiento.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "KeePassium can automatically delete old backup files to free up some storage space."; ObjectID = "B3L-Dk-Uq3"; Note = "Settings section of the `Keep Backup Files` option";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Periodic cleanup"; ObjectID = "B3L-Dk-Uq3"; Note = "Settings section of the `Keep Backup Files` option";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Make Backup Copies"; ObjectID = "BJ7-eQ-JOc"; Note = "Settings option: backup databases before saving them";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Keep Backup Files"; ObjectID = "G42-gR-eKm"; Note = "Settings option: how long to keep backup copies. Example: `Keep Backup Copies: 3 days`";

trans-unit.source: Exclude Backup Files from System Backup
trans-unit.target: Excluir archivos de la copia de seguridad del sistema
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Exclude Backup Files from System Backup"; ObjectID = "Qs6-uS-gdS"; Note = "Settings option, on/off";
Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "{Delete ALL Backup Files (1)}"; ObjectID = "RXF-mN-5RB"; Note = "#bc-ignore!";

trans-unit.source: Backup copies will appear along with the original files.
trans-unit.target: Las copias de seguridad se muestran junto a los archivos originales.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Backup copies will appear along with the original files."; ObjectID = "XeH-7q-aad"; Note = "Explanation for the `Show Backup Files` option";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Show Backup Files"; ObjectID = "aEK-cJ-9bc"; Note = "Settings option: whether to show backup copies in the list of database files";

trans-unit.source: Defines whether backup databases created by KeePassium should be excluded from iCloud/iTunes backup. Applies to all the existing and future backup files.
trans-unit.target: Define si las bases de datos de las copias de seguridad creadas por KeePassium deben excluirse de la copia de seguridad de iCloud/iTunes. Se aplica a todos los archivos de copia de seguridad existentes y futuros.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Defines whether backup databases created by KeePassium should be excluded from iCloud/iTunes backup. Applies to all the existing and future backup files."; ObjectID = "fst-lq-BDl"; Note = "Section header, refers to Apple's backup services (https://support.apple.com/HT203977)";

trans-unit.target: Copia de seguridad de iTunes y iCloud
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "iTunes and iCloud Backup"; ObjectID = "fst-lq-BDl"; Note = "Section header, refers to Apple's backup services (https://support.apple.com/HT203977)";

trans-unit.source: Before saving a database, KeePassium will automatically make a copy, just in case.
trans-unit.target: Antes de guardar una base de datos, KeePassium hará una copia automática por seguridad.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Before saving a database, KeePassium will automatically make a copy, just in case."; ObjectID = "nBI-OF-9iV"; Note = "Explanation for the `Make Backup Copies` option";
Class = "UILabel"; text = "Search in Passwords"; ObjectID = "1LC-s7-Kdl"; Note = "An switch in settings: whether to include protected field values in search procedure.";

trans-unit.source: After opening a database, automatically show the search field.
trans-unit.target: Mostrar automáticamente el campo de búsqueda tras abrir una base de datos.

trans-unit.target: Borrar asociaciones de archivos de clave
trans-unit.note: Class = "UIButton"; normalTitle = "Clear Key File Associations"; ObjectID = "3uV-Zs-RRo";

trans-unit.source:
Once you unlock a database, its master key can be stored in device's secure keychain. The next time, KeePassium will use that key so you won't have to type your full master password again.
(Master keys are automatically cleared on database timeout.)
trans-unit.target:
Una vez abierta una base de datos, la clave maestra se puede almacenar en la cadena de claves segura del iPhone (KeyChain). La próxima vez, KeePassium utilizará esa clave para no introducir la contraseña maestra completa de nuevo.
(Las claves maestras se borran automáticamente al cumplirse el tiempo de espera de la base de datos)
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Once you unlock a database, its master key can be stored in device's secure keychain. The next time, KeePassium will use that key so you won't have to type your full master password again. \n\n(Master keys are automatically cleared on database timeout.)"; ObjectID = "Faj-km-pM5";

trans-unit.source: Remember and automatically select the last used key file for each database. Clearing the associations does not affect the files.
trans-unit.target: Recordar y seleccionar automáticamente el último archivo de clave usado para cada base de datos. Limpiar las asociaciones no afecta a los archivos.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Remember and automatically select the last used key file for each database. Clearing the associations does not affect the files."; ObjectID = "Mxu-GP-FmN";

trans-unit.source: Cached keys allow KeePassium to skip key derivation and YubiKey scans whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: Las claves almacenadas en caché permiten a KeePassium omitir la derivación de claves y escaneos de YubiKey siempre que sea posible.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Cached keys allow KeePassium to skip key derivation and YubiKey scans whenever possible. "; ObjectID = "Zqb-p5-Ft8"; Note = "Section title: advanced/expert settings";
Class = "UITableViewSection"; headerTitle = "Advanced"; ObjectID = "Zqb-p5-Ft8"; Note = "Section title: advanced/expert settings";

trans-unit.source: Hide passwords and other protected fields behind asterisks (recommended).
trans-unit.target: Ocultar contraseñas y otros campos protegidos detrás de asteriscos (recomendado).
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Hide passwords and other protected fields behind asterisks (recommended)."; ObjectID = "e6Y-AP-hag";

trans-unit.source: Use Universal Clipboard to copy and paste between your Apple devices. On external devices, this clipboard is cleared after two minutes.
trans-unit.target: Utilice el portapapeles universal para copiar y pegar entre sus dispositivos Apple. En dispositivos externos, este portapapeles se borra después de dos minutos.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Use Universal Clipboard to copy and paste between your Apple devices. On external devices, this clipboard is cleared after two minutes."; ObjectID = "g9a-rJ-4WJ";

trans-unit.target: Borrar claves maestras en tiempo de espera
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Clear Master Keys on Timeout"; ObjectID = "gTm-F6-EDQ";

trans-unit.source: When you copy anything, KeePassium will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after some time.
trans-unit.target: Cuando copies texto, KeePassium limpiará automáticamente el portapapeles después de un tiempo.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "When you copy anything, KeePassium will automatically clear your clipboard (pasteboard) after some time."; ObjectID = "hnI-Q8-Ixm";

trans-unit.source: Database timeout closes any opened databases and clears any remembered master keys after some time.
trans-unit.target: Tras el tiempo de espera de la base de datos, todas las bases de datos abiertas se cerrarán y sus claves maestras se borrarán.
trans-unit.note: Class = "UITableViewSection"; footerTitle = "Database timeout closes any opened databases and clears any remembered master keys after some time."; ObjectID = "neJ-eG-TV7";

trans-unit.target: Claves de cifrado obtenidas en caché
trans-unit.note: Class = "UILabel"; text = "Cache Derived Encryption Keys"; ObjectID = "siQ-LK-GXZ"; Note = "Setting: preserve (cache) calculated database keys";

trans-unit.target: Tiempo de espera de la base de datos
